arabic_text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: (61) In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.[1614]
footnotes: [1614]- An alternative meaning has also been given:  "...in that We will replace the likes of you [with others upon the earth] and create you [in the Hereafter] in that which you do not know."
